actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

official_title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating September 18, 1980, as "Constantino Brumidi Day".

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate September 18, 1980, as "Constantino Brumidi Day."

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating September 18, 1980, as "Constantino Brumidi Day".
